dcterms:creator: M. Baigang
F. Yi
dcterms:description: The NER dataset is utilized for evaluating the performance of various models in named entity recognition tasks, providing a structured resource for training and assessing NER applications.
dcterms:title: NER Dataset

dcterms:creator: I. Pilán

dcterms:description: The TAB dataset serves as a benchmark for text anonymization, providing a dedicated corpus and evaluation framework to facilitate the comparison and advancement of anonymization methods.
dcterms:title: TAB (Text Anonymization Benchmark)
